bib_record.title: Experimental determination of k0, Q0, <Er> factors and neutron cross-sections for 41 isotopes of interest in Neutron Activation Analysis.

free_txt: Irradiation channels S84, Y4, X26 and
Cavity at the BR1 reactor at SCK-CEN, Belgium.
factors Gt and Ge were obtained through the MATSSF and
the Sigmoid calculation methods, are given in Table 1
- EN-MIN-NM was taken as Cd cut-off energy 0.55 eV for
1 mm Cd-covers ( as mentioned in the article, page 932,
- Two sigma uncertainties DATA-ERR and ERR-SYS were
converted into one sigma uncertainty ( divided by 2.)
HPGe detectors equipped with LFC modules for
Maximum expected uncertainty on an induced gamma
specific activity (A) and a Cd ratio (RCd) at 1s
confidence level. RCd uncertainty corresponds to the
quadratic summation of twice the uncertainty reported.
Irradiation channels S84, Y4, X26 and
Cavity at the BR1 reactor at SCK-CEN, Belgium.
f - ratio of the thermal neutron flux to epithermal
a - slope parameter of the epithermal spectrum
The rabbits were irradiated in channels
S84, Y4, X26 and  the thermal Cavity at the BR1.
Typical irr.time  7 hr    1 or 7hr  3 or 7hr 2 or 4hr
Summary of previous k0 measurements up to Dec.2002.
Standards were positioned within a 2 cm distance to the
nearest comparator along the axis of a cylindrical
polyethylene container (PE rabbit) following a sandwich
pattern. Up to 10 samples per rabbit were irradiated on
Replicate samples were positioned inside 1 mm thick
Cd covers and were irradiated on the same irradiation
